member.name: T:MG.Posh.Extensions.Bound.BoundBuiltinParameterExtensions

member.summary: Performs a "ContainsKey" lookup on the current BoundParameters against the specified built-in parameter, returning if bound.
member.typeparam: The type of whose bound parameters are checked.
member.param: The that the method is extending.
The built-in parameter to check.

member.name: M:MG.Posh.Extensions.Bound.BoundParameterExtensions.ContainsAnyParameters``1(``0,System.Linq.Expressions.Expression{System.Func{``0,System.Object}}[])
